abstracts.cdata!:
Executive Directors approved the Second
            Programmatic Fiscal Sustainability Development Policy Loan
            (FSDPL2) Project to Jamaica in the amount of US$100 million
            on the payment terms and conditions set out in the
            President's Memorandum (R2011-0194). Executive
            Directors expressed support for the DPL and the overall
            design of the program, and that its three main policy areas
            are an adequate foundation for the Government's
            long-term development strategy. Executive Directors observed
            that the DPL builds upon progress made under the previous
            operation and that the DPL's coverage of fiscal reforms
            is a key determinant of economic stability and a foundation
            for inclusive growth. Executive Directors also noted the
            delays in the IMF program and encouraged the Jamaican
            authorities to take steps to conclude the fourth and fifth
            reviews under the International Monetary Fund (IMF) Stand-By
            Arrangement. Executive Directors acknowledged the external
            and internal challenges that remain and encouraged further
            efforts by the authorities in improving fiscal and debt
            sustainability. They urged continued collaboration among
            development partners to ensure successful implementation of
            this project.
